text: New smartphones Wiko™ is an international brand born in Marseille, France, and is now present in more than 30 countries in Europe, Africa, the Middle East, Asia, and now in the United States. Wiko successfully maintains the top four mobile device position in Western Europe and continues its growth and success. Wiko USA launched in 2019 and debuted its first smartphone with the exclusive partnership of Boost Mobile. The stylish Wiko Ride smartphone is equipped with essential functionalities, affordable, and easy to use. Wiko USA's vision is to see our consumers as our community that lives on their terms and driven by their individuality.
